markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">[Quicken Time](/Spells.aspx?ID=1187)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 182</row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You speed up the time stream in an area, stretching and pulling it until time flows swift and wild. Any creature that begins its turn in the area is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) and can use the extra action each round to Stride or Strike. Unfortunately, speeding up time is much more difficult than slowing it down, and the effect is uneven and jittery, making accuracy between times painfully difficult; creatures inside the area are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) to those outside it, and vice versa.
name: Quicken Time

summary: Accelerate time in a nearby area
summary_markdown: Accelerate time in a nearby area
text: Quicken Time Source Dark Archive pg. 182 Traditions Arcane, Occult Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 20-foot burst Duration 1 minute --- You speed up the time stream in an area, stretching and pulling it until time flows swift and wild. Any creature that begins its turn in the area is quickened and can use the extra action each round to Stride or Strike. Unfortunately, speeding up time is much more difficult than slowing it down, and the effect is uneven and jittery, making accuracy between times painfully difficult; creatures inside the area are concealed to those outside it, and vice versa.
